scripts.doc: documentation readme src/ol-wfst.ts --quiet=true --access=public --access=undefined --section=API --parse-extension ts && node scripts/external-links.js README.md && prettier --write README.md
scripts.copy-assets: ncp src/assets/ tmp-dist/assets/ && ncp src/assets/ tmp-lib/assets/
scripts.build: npm run precleanstart && tsc --pretty --project ./tsconfig-lib.json && tsc --pretty --project ./tsconfig-dist.json && npm run copy-assets && rollup --config rollup.config.dist.js && rollup --config rollup.config.lib.js
scripts.postbuild: ncp tmp-lib/ol-wfst.d.ts dist/ol-wfst.d.js && ncp src/ol-wfst.css dist/ol-wfst.css && ncp src/bootstrap-modal.css dist/bootstrap-modal.css && ncp src/ol-wfst.css lib/ol-wfst.css && ncp src/bootstrap-modal.css lib/bootstrap-modal.css && del-cli tmp-dist tmp-lib
